import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// usestate 같은 역할
export var userReducer=createSlice({name:"teacherUid",initialState:{uid:"고유 번호",name:'rodtls'},reducers:{setTeacherUidAndName:function setTeacherUidAndName(state,uid){return uid.payload;}}});var setTeacherUidAndName=userReducer.actions.setTeacherUidAndName;export{setTeacherUidAndName};export default userReducer.reducer;
